name: An attempt was made...  This is not the NFT you're looking for

metadata.name: The Brighter The Burn - Carrie Able - 1
metadata.description:
Combining an ambient vibe with a percussive groove, and produced by Arden Altino & Matt Ward (Weav Music) for the optimal interactive experience, “The Brighter the Burn” by Carrie Able is ripe for a remix. Or a thousand.

The player, powered by Weav, is preloaded with one of thousands of combinations. Listen, and experiment with alternative options until you find your perfect mix. Highlight the vocals to lean into the ambiance, or make it funky with some unexpected percussion.

Not sure where to start? Roll the dice to generate a random, ready to mint mix. 

Weav is changing the dynamic between music and music lovers by using stems, the building blocks of recorded music. This collection is a collaboration between Carrie Able and Weav, and offers music lovers an opportunity to engage with the song in a whole new way. 

In total, this collection will offer 1111 opportunities to mint totally unique stem combinations.
